channel.title: FLF - Leadership Now Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 156: Overlooked Emotional Sins: Depression [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Depression has been on the rise in our society over the past few decades, or so it seems. Tune into this episode where Dr. Aaron Rock talks about the different causes of depression, pills and pharmaceuticals, how it relates to human sinfulness, and how the Bible speaks to each issue in our lives and can help us find joy in the Christian life. 

 

More Resources:

More resources at Beachhead Media's website: https://beachheadmedia.ca/

Beachhead Media YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTRwY4I8_rSQ7Z6I05k8lkA
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: 155: Overlooked Emotional Sins: Anxiety [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Tune in to this week's episode as Aaron covers the sin of anxiety. What does it stem from? Why is it a sin? And practical steps from the Bible on how to combat anxious thoughts in our lives. All of that and more in this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock!

 

More Resources:

More resources at Beachhead Media's website: https://beachheadmedia.ca/
